thread.title: Vicente Fox Rips ‘So-Called President’ Trump After POTUS Claims Obama Tapped His Phones
thread.title_full: Vicente Fox Rips ‘So-Called President’ Trump After POTUS Claims Obama Tapped His Phones | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: Vicente Fox Rips ‘So-Called President’ Trump After POTUS Claims Obama Tapped His Phones
text:
Early this morning, President Donald Trump created a media and political firestorm by unleashing a tweetstorm in which he accused former President Barack Obama of wiretapping his phones at Trump Tower.
Obviously, there was a bunch of reaction to this explosive accusation, including from Obama’s own team . One other person who weighed in with his opinion has been one of Trump’s harshest critics — former Mexican President Vicente Fox Quesada .
Fox took to Twitter to slam Trump, using some of Trump’s own insults against him.
A "so-called" President is calling a real President and true leader: bad and sick guy. What a shame, America you need to do something now!
— Vicente Fox Quesada (@VicenteFoxQue) March 4, 2017
. @realDonaldTrump is more aware of what happens in reality TV than his own country. He's a very bad apprentice of politics!
— Vicente Fox Quesada (@VicenteFoxQue) March 4, 2017
The ex-prez has taken numerous shots Trump in the past. He compared Trump to Fidel Castro following Castro’s death. He’s regularly used f-bombs while telling Trump that Mexico will not pay for the border wall. Fox has also referred to the president as a “hated gringo.”
—
